name: Red and Blue (itch) (Paksuuu)
description:
Red and Blue is a difficult puzzle platformer where you're able to attach with other cubes to beat levels ranging from easy, medium, and hard.
If you manage to beat the game comment down below what your time was (also include a screenshot if you can).  \( ﾟヮﾟ)/

Controls: 
WASD - Player Movement
R - Restart Level
J - Use Original Cube and Detach (only when attached with another cube)
K - Swap to the Other Cube and Detach (only when attached with another cube)
